messages.subject: SHQ SPY DIVISION New Look
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.shinsengumihq.com/spydivision.htm the sub pages still need to be revised ... http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/ (if you friend the blog, the blog
messages.messageBody:
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/spydivision.htm

the sub pages still need to be revised
--------------------------------------
http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/

(if you friend the blog, the blog friends you back)

has some more pop-culture updates and Japanese Fanart
and we still need someone to blog updates
any volunteers?

secretarytocapt3 really busy with just Shinsengumihq.com maintenance
and research (^_^;)

the blog is a paid account
--------------------------------------
please continue to post stories and fanart here at the mailing list
and in your posts tell us if you want your story on the site...we hope
that people will give constructive reviews to the writers and artists
who take the time to post to this list

and remember we like parodies or imaginary creations of Shinsengumi
products too

we also like 3D art
